docstr: `BLT` â€” Bitwise less than ### Description Determines whether an integral is a bitwise less than another. ### Syntax `RESULT = BLT(I, J)` ### Arguments type. | `J` | Shall be of `INTEGER` type, and of the same kind as `I`. ### Return value The return value is of type `LOGICAL` and of the default kind. ### Standard Fortran 2008 and later ### Class Elemental function ### See also BGE, BGT, BLE
